org.freehep.util.io
Class RunLengthInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      org.freehep.util.io.DecodingInputStream
          org.freehep.util.io.RunLengthInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, RunLength
public class RunLengthInputStream
extends DecodingInputStream
implements RunLength

The RunLengthStream decodes Run Length encoding. The exact definition of Run Length encoding can be found in the PostScript Language Reference (3rd ed.) chapter 3.13.3. *

Author:
Mark Donszelmann
